attributes.action: Allow refugees that have been resettled in the UK to do paid work.
attributes.additional_details: I think it would be more beneficial for these people to be allowed to do paid work in the UK, so they can contribute to our society and have more of a life here.
attributes.background: The UK government has started allowing additional refugees to live here which is great.  What's not so great is these people and families have to rely on support from the state.
